- Complete redesign of the App from the ground up
- Plan and book your journey with over 730,000 available routes and 1.2 million stations worldwide
- View real-time schedules and price ranges for trains, buses, ferries and flights
- Find the best driving, walking or rideshare routes
- Search and book a hotel right here on the app
- View all your past searches in one convenient spot

- You can now book tickets with Rome2rio!
- New public & private transport schedule experience
- Select journey origin or destination on map
- Improved map support - now with origin, destination and stop markers and full screen mode
- Log in with Google or Facebook to access your ticket purchases offline
- New Hotel view
- Performance will be faster across all devices

- Revamped Schedules and Search Results so that it's easier than ever to compare duration and complexity!
- Added a "Load more schedules" button that will instantly show you later schedules without having to do another search.
- Fixed an issue where months were labelled incorrectly in the calendar so thank you to everyone who sent us feedback on that.

- Now when you have the Rome2rio app installed, tapping on a Rome2rio web-link can open the app

Also fixing a bunch of bug fixes for iOS 13 and general improvements.
Search box also got an overhaul so it works better across iPhone and iPad.

Few bug fixes & improvements including:

- Options are no longer marked as fastest if they're the same duration as drive options
- New hotel experience! Now you can see more pictures and info on hotels around your destination and we've even included a handy map so that you can find hotels exactly where you need to be
- Fixing UI issues for iPhone 5s
